Source.Name: zekr
Source.Description: Zekr is an Open Source Quran study tool. This project is planned to be a universal, Open Source, and cross-platform application to perform most of the usual refers to the holy Quran.
Zekr, bir çok gelişmiş özelliğe sahip açık kaynaklı bir Kur'an okuma, dinleme ve araştırma uygulamasıdır.

Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable, use swt 3.7. It's using webkit-gtk instead of xulrunner.
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: zekr-trans
Source.Description: Various Translations for Zekr Open Source Quran study tool. Including; Brasilian, Dutch, English, German, Italian, Persian, Russian, Spanish, Turkish translations.
Kur'an uygulaması Zekr için Portekizce, Flamanca, İngilizce, Almanca, Italyanca, Farsça, Rusça, İspanyolca, Türkçe mealler.

Update.Comment: Add more Turkish and some new translations.
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: audex
Source.Description: Audex is a audio grabber tool for CD-ROM drives based on KDE. It can creates profiles for LAME, OGG Vorbis (oggenc), FLAC, FAAC (AAC/MP4) and RIFF WAVE.
Audex, ses CD'lerini farklı formatlarda kaydetmenizi sağlayan bir KDE uygulamasıdır. LAME, OGG, Vorbis(oggenc), FLAC (AAC/MP4) ve RIFF WAVE formatlarını destekler.

Source.Name: kdocker
Source.Summary: Dock any application into the system tray
Source.Description: KDocker will help you dock any application into the system tray.
KDocker, sistem tepsisine yerleşme özelliği olmayan uygulamaları sistem tepsisine küçültmenizi sağlar.

Source.Name: kde-servicemenu-audiokonverter
Source.Summary: A small utility with KDE service menus to easily convert sound files
Source.Description: Audiokonverter is a small utility to easily convert from OGG, MP3, AAC, M4A, FLAC, WMA, RealAudio, Musepack, Wavpack, WAV and movies to MP3, OGG, M4A, WAV and FLAC in file manager by right-clicking on them.

Source.Name: piedock
Source.Summary: A task bar and application launcher
Source.Description: PieDock is a task bar and application launcher in shape of a pie menu.

Source.Name: paintown
Source.Summary: A 2D fighting game in the same style as Double Dragon and TMNT
Streets of Rage benzeri 2 boyutlu dövüş oyunu
Source.Description: Paintown is an open source fighting game in the same genre as Streets of Rage and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.
Paintown, Streets of Rage ve Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles gibi oyunlara benzer açık kaynaklı bir dövüş oyunudur.

Source.Name: truecrypt
Source.Description: Free open-source disk encryption software for Windows Vista/XP, Mac OS X, and Linux.
Free open-source disk encryption software for Windows Vista/XP, Mac OS X, and Linux.

Update.Comment: Bump, use original tarball. Add needed files in a hacky way.
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: icoutils
Source.Summary: Set of program for extracting and converting images in Windows icon and cursor files
Source.Description: The icoutils are a set of program for extracting and converting images in Microsoft Windows(R) icon and cursor files. These files usually have the extension .ico or .cur, but they can also be embedded in executables and libraries (.dll-files).

Source.Name: q4wine
Source.Summary: Qt4 utility for management wine applications and prefixes
Wine ayarları için QT4 arayüzlü bir uygulaması
Source.Description: q4wine is an qt4 GUI for W.I.N.E. It will helps you to manage wine prefixes and installed applications.
q4wine, wine ile ilgili çeşitli ayarları yapmak için WineTools esas alınarak hazırlanmış bir Qt4 uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: whohas
Source.Summary: Which distribution has which version of what packages
Source.Description: whohas is a command line tool that allows querying several package lists at once - currently supported are Arch, Debian, Fedora, Gentoo, openSUSE, Slackware (and linuxpackages.net), Source Mage, Ubuntu, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, Fink and MacPorts.

whohas, çeşitli dağıtımlar arasında pek çok paket hakkında sorgulama yapabilen bir konsol uygulamasıdır. Arch, Debian, Fedora, Gentoo, openSUSE, Slackware (ve linuxpackages.net), Source Mage, Ubuntu, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, Fink ve MacPorts'u destekler.

Source.Name: atool
Source.Summary: A script for managing file archives
Source.Description: atool is a script for managing file archives of various types (tar, tar+gzip, zip etc).
atool; tar, tar+gzip, zip gibi arşiv dosyalarını kolayca yönetebilmeniz için hazırlanmış betiklerden oluşur.

Update.Comment: Version bump: *Support for lzip and xz *Fixes a bug in arepack with tar archives *Support for GNU tar's --xv, --lzop and --lzma options
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Version bump, add translations.xml and bash completion support
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: converseen
Source.Summary: An easy to use image batch converter and thumbnail creator
Kullanışlı bir toplu resim dönüştürme ve önizleme oluşturma aracı
Source.Description: Converseen is a project written in C++ with Qt4 libraries. It supports more than 100 image formats. You can convert an unlimited number of images and / or create thumbnails to any of the most popular formats: DPX, EXR, GIF, JPEG, JPEG-2000, PDF, PhotoCD, PNG, Postscript, SVG, and TIFF.

Converseen, 100'den fazla grafik formatını destekleyen bir Qt4 uygulamasıdır. DPX, EXR, GIF, JPEG, JPEG-2000, PDF, PhotoCD, PNG, Postscript, SVG, ve TIFF formatları arasında dönüştürme yapmanızı ve/veya önizleme resimleri oluşturmanızı sağlar.

Source.Name: imagination
Source.Description: Imagination is a lightweight and simple DVD slide show maker written in C language and built with the GTK+2 toolkit.
Imagination, kullanışlı ve basit bir DVD slayt oluşturma uygulamasıdır. GTK+2 araç takımı kullanılarak C ile yazılmıştır.

Update.Comment: First release. (Initial release by Eren Türkay)
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: radiotray
Source.Summary: Online radio player for system tray
Sistem tepsisi için çevrimiçi radyo çalıcısı
Source.Description: Radio Tray is an online radio streaming player that runs on system tray. Its goal is to have the minimum interface possible, making it very straightforward to use.
Radio Tray, sistem tepsisine yerleşen çok sade bir arayüze sahip çevrimiçi radyo çalıcısıdır.

Update.Comment: Bug fixes, Updated translations, Added first run configuration dialog
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: qmmp-skin-oxygen
Source.Description: Simple Oxygen skin for Qmmp.
Qmm için basit bir Oxygen teması.

Source.Name: milazzo
Source.Description: Milazzo is a fullscreen front end for MPRIS compliant music players, including Amarok, Audacious, Dragon Player, VLC and others.

Source.Name: decibel-audio-player
Source.Description: Decibel Audio Player is a GTK+ open-source (GPL) audio player for GNU/Linux. It is very straightforward to use thanks to a clean and user-friendly interface.

Source.Name: waheela
Source.Description: Waheela is a program that offers you a party mode for Amarok2. It's a similar to kirocker, but it's a kde4 program. It supports themes and gives you the possibility to look the player with a password.
Waheela, KDE4 için Kirocker benzeri bir Amarok2 ara yüzüdür. Tema desteği ve oynatıcıyı şifre ile açma gibi özellikleri ile tam ekran bir oynatıcı sağlar.

Source.Name: cute-giraffe
Source.Description: Cute Giraffe is a video/audio/image codec which is designed initially as a GUI wrapper for ffmpeg but with great ambitions to provide advanced support for ffmpeg and other libraries.
Cute Giraffe ffmpeg kullanarak video/ses/resim dönüştürme işlemlerini yapabilen bir grafik arayüzdür.

Source.Name: pidgin-musictracker
Source.Summary: A plugin for Pidgin which displays the music track currently playing in your status
Dinlediğiniz müziği Pidgin'de gösteren bir eklenti
Source.Description: Musictracker is a plugin for Pidgin which displays the music track currently playing in your status. Currently supported players: Amarok, Rhythmbox, Audacious, XMMS, MPC/MPD, Exaile, Banshee, Quod Libet.
Musictracker, dinlediğiniz muziği durum bilgisi olarak Pidgin'de gösterir. Amarok, Rhythmbox, Audacious, XMMS, MPC/MPD, Exaile, Banshee ve Quod Libet uygulamalarını destekler.
